data.description:
*** Over 15,000 Downloads, thank you !

Get ready for a Galactic Bar Fight!

Galactic Bar Fight is a fast-paced arena combat game starting in  Pegasus, an intergalactic watering hole in the distant future and then take a tour across the galaxy to various environments all over.

Players will be able to complete a variety of our 340+ challenges in both our pegasus hub where they can destroy training droids, practice shooting holograms, observe Hologram stage performers, and more. As well as the in-combat challenges players will be randomly served.

Within the   bar arenas  players will creatively dispatch enemies using blasters of all types. Featuring 13 unique weapons to Slash , smash , deflect, dissolve, burn ,  and split your enemies. and using Powerups to tip the edge in combat in their own favor.

All feedback is welcome - come help shape the future of Galactic Bar
Fight as we continue to expand the feature set with suggestions from
the community!

changelog.change_log: We present our last update to Galactic Bar Fight , 80 new challenges, 1 new weapon , 2 new enemies, and 1 brand new combat arena, thank you for joining us on this journey !!!!

Hello Captains and welcome to the Galactic Bar Fight 2.1 update 

In this build we have several new features, bug fixes, and support updates. 

New features: 

- 1 new combat Arena, Desolate dunes wih a shift on tighter corridor gameplay
- 6 new Music Tracks to listen to 
- 80+ new challenges

Improvements: 
- AI is now more aggressive and fun to fight against
- Slightly improved AI navigation
- lots of small bug fixes

We hope you have a blast and look forward to catching up in our next patches and Arena 3 release !

2.01 Build Notes" 


 "Updated Pergasus furniture Geometry" ]n
 "Fixed Power  drink Multi-use bug " 

" Increased necessary Force it takes to activate melee weapons so that it is harder to accidentally trigger melee attacks"

 "Added Several Floor and boundary reinforcement colliders to reduce likelihood of  objects falling through floor" 

"Reduced Required  Aria Tutorial  Interaction time to 1 second from 3 seconds" 

"Additional bug fixes and tweaks

"- New Central Hub space"  

"New Weapons"

" -New Music"

"-New Powerups"

"-New Grab Mechanics"

"-New Melee Physics"

"-New Challenge System"

"-Bascially awhole new game!"

"-and various bug fixes"

Hello and welcome to the Galactic Bar fight 2.0 Preview build , thank you so much for taking the time to check out our project and if you  have any feedback please email us at  jonathanj@weirdkidstudios.com ��We hope you have fun !
Test Upload to prep for future update , please do not download this is only a VERY empty scene , thank you !
